recipes.strInstructions:
Preheat oven to 350° F. Spray a 9x13-inch baking pan with non-stick spray.
Combine soy sauce, ½ cup water, brown sugar, ginger and garlic in a small saucepan and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer until the sauce thickens, about 5 minutes. Pour the sauce over the chicken and broccoli and stir to coat.
Bake in preheated oven until the chicken is no longer pink in the center, about 20 minutes. Stir in the rice and bake for an additional 5 minutes.
Sprinkle with green onions and sesame seeds before serving. Enjoy!
recipes.strInstructions_zh:
将烤箱预热至350°F (175°C)。在一个9x13英寸的烤盘上喷上防粘喷雾。
在一个小炖锅中，将酱油、半杯水、红糖、姜末和蒜末混合，用中高火煮沸。然后调至小火，慢炖约5分钟，直到酱汁变稠。将酱汁浇在鸡肉和西兰花上，搅拌均匀。
放入预热好的烤箱中烘烤约20分钟，直到鸡肉中心不再是粉红色。然后拌入米饭，再烤5分钟。
上桌前撒上葱花和芝麻即可享用！

recipes.strInstructions: To make the …
recipes.strInstructions_zh:
首先，将牛柳在热锅中用橄榄油快速煎至表面呈金黄色，取出后趁热均匀涂抹英式芥末酱，冷却备用。
将蘑菇打成泥（蘑菇酱），在干锅中炒去水分，直至非常干燥。铺一张保鲜膜，上面依次铺上帕尔玛火腿片、炒好的蘑菇酱，然后放上冷却的牛柳，用保鲜膜紧紧卷起，放入冰箱冷藏定型至少30分钟。
展开一张酥皮，将定型好的牛柳卷放在中间，用酥皮包裹起来，切掉多余部分，封口捏紧。用蛋黄液涂抹在酥皮表面，可以用刀背划出花纹。
放入预热至200°C的烤箱中，烤15-20分钟，直到酥皮金黄酥脆。取出后静置10分钟再切开，即可享用。

recipes.strInstructions: Pick through your lentils for any foreign matter, rinse them 2 or 3 times, drain, and set aside.  Heat oil in a pot over medium heat. Add onions, carrots, and celery and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add lentils, chicken broth, water, and salt. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes, until lentils are tender.  Stir in tomato paste, mint, and red pepper flakes. Simmer for 5 minutes. Serve hot, with a wedge of lemon to squeeze over the soup.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 仔细挑拣你的扁豆，去除杂质，冲洗2-3次后沥干备用。在锅中用中火加热橄榄油。加入洋葱、胡萝卜和芹菜，翻炒5分钟，偶尔搅拌。加入大蒜，再煮1分钟。加入扁豆、鸡汤、水和盐。煮沸后，转小火慢炖20分钟，直到扁豆变软。拌入番茄酱、薄荷和红辣椒片。再慢炖5分钟。趁热上桌，可搭配一片柠檬，挤汁在汤上享用。

recipes.strInstructions: Fry the finely chopped onions and minced meat in oil. Add the salt and pepper. Grease a round baking tray and put a layer of pastry in it. Cover with a thin layer of filling and cover this with another layer of pastry. Put the baking tray in the oven and bake for 45 minutes at 200°C. When the burek is baked, sprinkle it with water and put it back in the oven for a short time (around 1 minute) to steam. Cut into quarters and serve.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 将切碎的洋葱和牛肉末在油中炒熟。加入盐和胡椒调味。在一个圆形的烤盘上涂上油，铺上一层酥皮。盖上一层薄薄的馅料，然后再盖上一层酥皮。将烤盘放入烤箱，在200°C下烘烤45分钟。当派烤好后，在表面撒上一些水，然后放回烤箱里短暂地蒸一下（约1分钟）。切成四份即可食用。

recipes.strInstructions: If you want to bake potatoes in the oven, you must first wash them well. Then dry them well and wrap them in aluminum foil. In a preheated 200-degree oven, bake for about 1.5 hours, until the inside is soft. If you want to speed up this process, you can soften the potatoes in the microwave for about 6-8 minutes, then wrap them in aluminum foil and bake in the oven for about 20-30 minutes. Once the potatoes have been baked, take them out of the oven, cut them in half and use a fork to fluff up the inside of the potato. Add butter and cheese and mix thoroughly. Finally, add your favourite toppings and serve.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 如果你想在烤箱里烤土豆，首先必须将它们彻底洗净。然后擦干并用铝箔纸包裹起来。在预热到200度的烤箱中，烘烤约1.5小时，直到内部变软。如果想加快速度，可以先在微波炉中加热约6-8分钟使其变软，然后再用铝箔纸包好，放入烤箱烤约20-30分钟。土豆烤好后，从烤箱中取出，切成两半，用叉子将土豆内部搅松。加入黄油和奶酪，并充分混合。最后，加入你喜欢的配料即可上桌。

recipes.strInstructions: Soak the fava beans in water overnight. The next day, drain the beans and wash them, then put them in a food processor with the onions, garlic, parsley, coriander, salt, cumin, black pepper, and chili. Process until the mixture is all blended, but still has some texture. Transfer the mixture to a bowl, stir in the bicarbonate of soda, and leave to stand for 30 minutes. Form the mixture into small balls. Heat the oil in a deep pan and fry the tamiya for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden and crisp. Serve hot.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 将蚕豆在水中浸泡一夜。第二天，沥干并清洗蚕豆，然后将它们与洋葱、大蒜、欧芹、香菜、盐、孜然、黑胡椒和辣椒粉一起放入食物处理器。搅打至混合物均匀，但仍保留一些颗粒感。将混合物转移到碗中，拌入小苏打，静置30分钟。将混合物捏成小球。在深锅中加热油，将蚕豆饼每面炸2-3分钟，直至金黄酥脆。趁热食用。

recipes.strInstructions:
Wash and soak toor dal in approx. 3 cups of water, for at least one hours. Dal will be double in volume after soaking. Drain the water.
Cook dal with 2 cups of water and ½ tsp salt in a pressure cooker. Wait for 3-4 whistles. If you are cooking in a pan, cover and cook till dal is soft and done.
Once the pressure releases, open the lid and check if dal is cooked. If not, add more water and cook for few more minutes.
In a separate pan, heat ghee. Add cumin seeds, broken red chillies, asafoetida and curry leaves. When cumin seeds start changing colour, add green chilli, ginger and garlic. Saute for a minute.
Add onion and saute till it becomes translucent. Then add tomato and cook till it becomes soft and mushy. Add turmeric powder and red chilli powder and mix well.
Add cooked dal. Mix well and cook for 5 minutes. Add chopped coriander leaves and mix well.
Serve hot with roti, naan or rice.
recipes.strInstructions_zh:
将图尔豆（Toor dal）洗净，用约3杯水浸泡至少一小时。浸泡后，豆子体积会翻倍。倒掉水。
在高压锅中，用2杯水和半茶匙盐煮豆子。等待3-4声哨响。如果用普通锅煮，盖上盖子煮至豆子变软。
压力释放后，打开锅盖检查豆子是否煮熟。如果没有，加水再煮几分钟。
在另一个锅中加热酥油（Ghee）。加入孜然籽、干红辣椒、阿魏胶和咖喱叶。当孜然籽开始变色时，加入青辣椒、姜和蒜。炒一分钟。
加入洋葱，炒至半透明。然后加入番茄，煮至变软成糊状。加入姜黄粉和红辣椒粉，搅拌均匀。
加入煮好的豆子，混合均匀煮5分钟。加入切碎的香菜叶，搅拌均匀。
趁热与印度烤饼（roti, naan）或米饭一起食用。

recipes.strInstructions:
Heat oil in a deep fryer or deep heavy skillet to 365° F (185° C).
Warm gravy in saucepan or microwave. Season ground beef with salt and pepper. Cook in a skillet over medium heat, breaking up with a spoon, until no longer pink. Drain off excess fat.
Place the fries into the hot oil, and cook until light brown, about 5 minutes. Remove to a paper towel-lined plate to drain.
Place the fries on a serving platter, and sprinkle the cheese over them. Top with meat and ladle on the gravy. Serve immediately.
recipes.strInstructions_zh:
在深炸锅或深的重底煎锅中将油加热至365°F (185°C)。
在炖锅中或微波炉中加热肉汁。用盐和胡椒调味牛肉末。在中火上用煎锅烹饪，用勺子打散，直到不再呈粉红色。沥干多余的脂肪。
将薯条放入热油中，炸至浅棕色，约5分钟。取出放在铺有厨房纸的盘子上沥干。
将薯条放在餐盘上，撒上奶酪块。铺上肉末，淋上肉汁。立即享用。

recipes.strInstructions:
Heat the oil in a large saucepan. Use kitchen scissors to snip the bacon into small pieces, or use a sharp knife to chop it on a chopping board. Add the bacon to the pan and cook for just a few mins until starting to turn golden. Add the onion, celery and carrot, and cook over a medium heat for 5 mins, stirring occasionally, until softened.
Add the garlic and cook for 1 min, then tip in the mince and cook, stirring and breaking it up with a wooden spoon, for about 6 mins until browned all over.
Stir in the tomato purée and cook for 1 min, then pour in the wine and cook until it has evaporated. Add the stock and canned tomatoes, bring to a simmer and bubble for 20 mins, stirring occasionally. Season with salt and pepper.
To make the white sauce, melt the butter in a small saucepan over a medium heat. Add the flour and stir with a wooden spoon for 1-2 mins. Remove the pan from the heat and gradually pour in the milk, whisking all the time, until you have a smooth sauce. Return the pan to the heat and simmer, whisking, for 5-6 mins until the sauce has thickened. Season with salt, pepper and a grating of nutmeg.
Preheat the oven to 200C/180C fan/gas 6. Spoon a third of the meat sauce into the base of a 2-litre ovenproof dish. Cover with a single layer of lasagne sheets, breaking them to fit. Spoon over a third of the white sauce. Repeat the layers twice more, finishing with a layer of white sauce. Grate over the Parmesan and bake for 35-40 mins, or until golden brown and bubbling. Leave to stand for 10 mins before serving.
recipes.strInstructions_zh:
在一个大炖锅中加热橄榄油。用厨房剪刀将培根剪成小块，或用刀切碎。加入培根，煮几分钟至开始变金黄。加入洋葱、芹菜和胡萝卜，中火煮5分钟，偶尔搅拌，直到变软。
加入大蒜煮1分钟，然后倒入牛肉末，用木勺搅拌并打散，煮约6分钟直到全部变成棕色。
拌入番茄膏煮1分钟，然后倒入红酒煮至蒸发。加入牛肉汤和番茄罐头，煮沸后转小火炖20分钟，偶尔搅拌。用盐和胡椒调味。
制作白酱：在一个小平底锅中用中火融化黄油。加入面粉，用木勺搅拌1-2分钟。离火，逐渐倒入牛奶，同时不停搅拌，直到酱汁顺滑。回到火上，边搅拌边煮5-6分钟，直到酱汁变稠。用盐、胡椒和一点肉豆蔻调味。
预热烤箱至200°C。在一个2升的烤盘底部铺上三分之一的肉酱。铺上一层千层面片。再铺上三分之一的白酱。重复这个步骤两次，最后一层是白酱。撒上帕玛森奶酪碎，烤35-40分钟，直到金黄冒泡。上桌前静置10分钟。

recipes.strInstructions:
Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add kosher salt to the boiling water, then add the pasta. Cook according to package instructions, about 9 minutes.
In a large skillet over medium-high heat, add the olive oil and heat until it shimmers. Add the garlic and cook, stirring, until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes. Add the crushed red pepper flakes and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add the tomatoes, salt, and pepper. Bring to a simmer and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in the basil leaves. Ladle about ½ cup of the pasta water into the sauce and stir.
Drain the pasta and add it to the sauce. Garnish with cheese and basil leaves. Serve immediately.
recipes.strInstructions_zh:
将一大锅水煮沸。在沸水中加入犹太盐，然后加入意面。根据包装说明烹饪，约9分钟。
在一个大煎锅中，用中高火加热橄榄油至微光闪烁。加入大蒜，翻炒约1-2分钟至香气四溢。加入红辣椒片，炒约30秒至出味。加入番茄、盐和胡椒。煮沸后炖约5分钟，偶尔搅拌。拌入罗勒叶。舀约半杯煮意面的水到酱汁中，搅拌均匀。
沥干意面，将其加入酱汁中。撒上奶酪和罗勒叶点缀。立即享用。

recipes.strInstructions:
Put the flour, eggs, milk, 1 tbsp oil and a pinch of salt into a bowl or large jug, then whisk to a smooth batter. Set aside for 30 mins to rest if you have time, or start cooking straight away.
Set a medium frying pan or crêpe pan over a medium heat and carefully wipe it with some oiled kitchen paper. When hot, cook your pancakes for 1 min on each side until golden, keeping them warm in a low oven as you go.
Serve with lemon wedges and sugar, or your favourite filling. Once cold, you can layer the pancakes between baking parchment, wrap in cling film and freeze for up to 2 months.
recipes.strInstructions_zh:
将面粉、鸡蛋、牛奶、1汤匙油和一小撮盐放入碗或大壶中，然后搅拌成光滑的面糊。如果时间充裕，静置30分钟；否则可直接开始烹饪。
用中火预热一个中号煎锅或可丽饼锅，并用蘸油的厨房纸小心地擦拭锅底。锅热后，将面糊倒入，每面煎1分钟至金黄色。煎好的松饼可以放在低温烤箱中保温。
与柠檬角和糖，或你喜欢的馅料一同享用。冷却后，你可以在松饼之间用烘焙纸隔开，用保鲜膜包好，冷冻保存长达2个月。

recipes.strInstructions: Heat 1 tablespoon of butter and 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Season chicken with salt and pepper. Cook chicken in the skillet until brown on both sides. Remove from skillet and set aside. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of butter to the skillet. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add broccoli, carrots, and red pepper. Cook and stir for 4-5 minutes. Stir in heavy cream and chicken broth. Bring to a boil and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add fettuccine and cook for 8-10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in the Parmesan cheese, chicken, and parsley. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 在一个大煎锅中，用中高火加热1汤匙黄油和2汤匙橄榄油。用盐和胡椒给鸡肉调味。在锅中煎鸡肉至两面金黄，取出备用。将剩下的1汤匙黄油加入锅中。加入大蒜，炒香约1分钟。加入西兰花、胡萝卜和红椒，翻炒4-5分钟。拌入鲜奶油和鸡汤，煮沸2-3分钟。加入意式宽面，煮8-10分钟，偶尔搅拌。拌入帕玛森奶酪、鸡肉和欧芹。根据口味用盐和胡椒调味。立即享用。

recipes.strInstructions: Put a large saucepan on a medium heat and add 1 tbsp olive oil. Add 4 finely chopped bacon rashers and fry for 10 mins until golden and crisp. Reduce the heat and add the 2 onions, 2 carrots, 2 celery sticks, 2 garlic cloves and the leaves from 2-3 sprigs of rosemary, all finely chopped, then fry for 10 mins, stirring occasionally, until soft. Stir in 500g beef mince and 500g pork mince and cook until browned over. Stir in 300ml milk and cook until it has bubbled away. Scrape any bits from the bottom of the pan, then pour in 2 glasses of red wine and cook until the wine has evaporated. Stir in 2 x 400g tins of chopped tomatoes, the finely chopped leaves from 3 sprigs of thyme or ½ tsp dried, a bay leaf and 1 beef stock cube. Bring to a gentle simmer and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Cover and cook for 1 hr 30 mins, stirring occasionally, until you have a rich, thick sauce. Add the 250ml milk and cook for a further 30 mins, uncovered, until the sauce is thick and creamy. Add a pinch of nutmeg and adjust the seasoning to taste. To serve, cook 100g spaghetti per person in a large pan of boiling, salted water according to pack instructions. Drain and toss with a little of the bolognese sauce and a knob of butter. Divide the spaghetti between four plates and top with more sauce, a grating of parmesan and a scattering of fresh basil leaves.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 在一个大炖锅中用中火加热1汤匙橄榄油。加入4片切碎的培根，煎10分钟至金黄酥脆。调低火力，加入2个洋葱、2根胡萝卜、2根芹菜、2瓣大蒜和2-3枝迷迭香的叶子（全部切碎），翻炒10分钟至变软。加入500克牛肉末和500克猪肉末，炒至变色。拌入300毫升牛奶，煮至牛奶蒸发。刮一下锅底，然后倒入2杯红酒，煮至酒蒸发。拌入2罐400克的番茄碎、3枝百里香的叶子、1片月桂叶和1块牛肉汤块。温和地煮沸，用盐和现磨黑胡椒调味。盖上盖子，煮1.5小时，偶尔搅拌，直到酱汁浓郁。加入250毫升牛奶，不盖盖子再煮30分钟，直到酱汁浓稠柔滑。加入一小撮肉豆蔻，根据口味调整调味。上桌时，按每人100克的量，在一大锅沸腾的盐水中煮意面。沥干后与少量肉酱和一小块黄油搅拌。将意面分到四个盘子里，再浇上更多的酱汁，撒上帕玛森奶酪和新鲜的罗勒叶。

recipes.strInstructions: Wash and peel the potatoes. Cut them into pieces. Put the potatoes in a large pan and add the kale. Add the stock cube and the water. Bring to the boil and cook for 20-25 minutes until the potatoes are tender. Drain the potatoes and kale, but reserve some of the cooking liquid. Mash the potatoes and kale together and add the butter, milk and a little of the cooking liquid. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg. Serve with the smoked sausage.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 洗净并削皮土豆，切成块。将土豆放入一个大锅中，加入羽衣甘蓝。加入汤块和水。煮沸后，煮20-25分钟直到土豆变软。沥干土豆和羽衣甘蓝，但保留一些煮过的汤汁。将土豆和羽衣甘蓝一起捣成泥，加入黄油、牛奶和少量煮过的汤汁。用盐、胡椒和肉豆蔻调味。与烟熏香肠一起食用。

recipes.strInstructions: Heat the butter and oil in a large, non-stick frying pan. Add the onion and cook for 5-7 mins until starting to soften. Add the Brussels sprouts and bubble and squeak for 10-12 mins, stirring and turning it over every few minutes so that it becomes crisp and brown on both sides. Add the potatoes and cook for a further 5-7 mins, stirring occasionally. Season generously with salt and pepper. Serve with a poached egg on top.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 在一个大的不粘煎锅中加热黄油和油。加入洋葱，煮5-7分钟至开始变软。加入抱子甘蓝，翻炒10-12分钟，每隔几分钟翻动一下，使其两面都变得酥脆呈褐色。加入土豆，再煮5-7分钟，偶尔搅拌。用足量的盐和胡椒调味。上桌时在顶部放一个水波蛋。

recipes.strMeal: Beef Banh Mi Bowls with Sriracha Mayo
recipes.strInstructions: Add the rice, 2 cups of water, and a pinch of salt to a small saucepan. Bring to a boil, then cover and simmer for 15-20 minutes, until the water is absorbed. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, whisk together the sriracha, mayonnaise, and 1 tablespoon of water. In a separate bowl, whisk together the rice vinegar, sugar, and a pinch of salt. Add the shredded carrots and daikon, and toss to combine. Let sit for 10 minutes. In a large bowl, toss the beef with the soy sauce, garlic, and ginger. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the beef and cook, stirring occasionally, until browned and cooked through. To serve, divide the rice among 4 bowls. Top with the beef, pickled carrots and daikon, and a drizzle of sriracha mayo.
recipes.strMeal_zh: 是拉差蛋黄酱越南牛肉饭
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 将米饭、2杯水和一小撮盐加入小炖锅中。煮沸后盖上盖子，用小火煮15-20分钟，直到水被吸收。同时，在一个小碗中，将是拉差酱、蛋黄酱和1汤匙水搅拌均匀。在另一个碗中，将米醋、糖和一小撮盐搅拌均匀。加入胡萝卜丝和白萝卜丝，搅拌均匀，静置10分钟。在一个大碗中，将牛肉与酱油、大蒜和姜搅拌均匀。用中高火预热一个大煎锅。加入牛肉，偶尔翻炒，直到变色并完全煮熟。上桌时，将米饭分装到4个碗中。铺上牛肉、腌制的胡萝卜和白萝卜，再淋上是拉差蛋黄酱。

recipes.strInstructions: Whisk the cream until you have soft peaks, then fold in the icing sugar and vanilla. Gently crush the meringues and fold two-thirds of them into the cream, followed by half the strawberries. Spoon into four glasses and top with the remaining meringues and strawberries. Serve immediately.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 将鲜奶油搅打至软峰状，然后拌入糖粉和香草精。轻轻地压碎蛋白霜，将其中的三分之二拌入奶油中，然后加入一半的草莓。用勺子分装到四个玻璃杯中，顶部用剩余的蛋白霜和草莓装饰。立即享用。

recipes.strInstructions: Heat the olive oil in a large pan and add the onion, celery and fennel. Cook for 5 mins until soft, then add the garlic, chilli, saffron and fennel seeds. Cook for 1 min more, then stir in the tomatoes, wine and stock. Bring to the boil, then simmer for 10 mins. Add the fish and simmer for 5 mins more, or until the fish is cooked through. To make the rouille, pound the garlic, chilli and saffron together in a pestle and mortar. Add the bread and pound until you have a paste. Whisk in the egg yolk, then gradually add the olive oil, whisking all the time, until you have a thick, mayonnaise-like sauce. Serve the stew with the rouille and crusty bread.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 在一个大锅里加热橄榄油，加入洋葱、芹菜和茴香。煮5分钟直到变软，然后加入大蒜、辣椒、藏红花和茴香籽。再煮1分钟，然后拌入番茄、白葡萄酒和鱼汤。煮沸后，慢炖10分钟。加入鱼肉，再炖5分钟，或者直到鱼肉完全煮熟。制作蒜香蛋黄酱(rouille)：在研钵中将大蒜、辣椒和藏红花一起捣碎。加入面包，捣成糊状。拌入蛋黄，然后逐渐加入橄榄油，同时不停搅拌，直到得到像蛋黄酱一样浓稠的酱汁。将炖鱼与蒜香蛋黄酱和硬皮面包一起食用。

recipes.strInstructions: Heat the oil in a large casserole dish and fry the bacon for 2-3 mins until golden. Add the beef and cook until browned on all sides. Add the shallots, carrots, celery, garlic and mushrooms and cook for 5-7 mins until starting to soften. Sprinkle over the flour and cook for 1 min. Pour in the wine and stock, then add the bay leaf and thyme. Bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 2-3 hrs, or until the beef is tender. Season with salt and pepper and serve with mashed potatoes.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 在一个大的砂锅里加热橄榄油，将培根煎2-3分钟至金黄。加入牛肉，煎至四面变色。加入小洋葱、胡萝卜、芹菜、大蒜和蘑菇，煮5-7分钟至开始变软。撒上面粉，煮1分钟。倒入红酒和牛肉汤，然后加入月桂叶和百里香。煮沸后，调低火力，慢炖2-3小时，直到牛肉变嫩。用盐和胡椒调味，与土豆泥一同食用。

recipes.strInstructions: In a bowl, combine the flour, salt, pepper, paprika, and garlic powder. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg and milk. Dip each piece of chicken in the egg mixture, then dredge in the flour mixture, making sure to coat completely. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Fry the chicken for 15-20 minutes, turning occasionally, until golden brown and cooked through. Drain on a wire rack.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 在一个碗里，混合面粉、盐、胡椒、辣椒粉和蒜粉。在另一个碗里，打散鸡蛋并与牛奶混合。将每块鸡肉先浸入鸡蛋混合液中，然后再裹上一层面粉混合物，确保完全覆盖。在一个大煎锅中用中高火加热油。将鸡肉炸15-20分钟，偶尔翻面，直到金黄酥脆并完全煮熟。放在烤架上沥干油份。

recipes.strInstructions: Whisk the egg yolks and sugar together in a large bowl until pale and thick. Add the mascarpone and whisk until smooth. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg whites until you have soft peaks. Fold the egg whites into the mascarpone mixture. In a shallow dish, combine the coffee and brandy. Dip the ladyfingers into the coffee mixture for a few seconds on each side, then arrange them in a single layer in the bottom of a 9x13-inch dish. Spread half of the mascarpone mixture over the ladyfingers. Repeat with another layer of ladyfingers and mascarpone mixture. Cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours. To serve, dust with cocoa powder.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 在一个大碗里将蛋黄和糖搅打至颜色变浅、质地浓稠。加入马斯卡彭奶酪，搅打至顺滑。在另一个碗里，将蛋白打至软峰状。将蛋白轻轻拌入马斯卡彭混合物中。在一个浅盘里，混合咖啡和白兰地。将手指饼干在咖啡混合物中每面浸泡几秒钟，然后在9x13英寸的盘子底部铺成一层。将一半的马斯卡彭混合物铺在手指饼干上。重复铺一层手指饼干和马斯卡彭混合物。盖上盖子，冷藏至少4小时。上桌时，撒上可可粉。

recipes.strInstructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the linguine and cook according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, melt the butter over medium-high heat. Add the shrimp, garlic, and red pepper flakes. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the shrimp are pink and cooked through, about 2-3 minutes. Stir in the wine and lemon juice. Bring to a simmer and cook for 1 minute. Stir in the parsley and season with salt and pepper to taste. Drain the linguine and add it to the skillet. Toss to combine. Serve immediately.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 将一大锅盐水煮沸。加入扁面条，根据包装说明烹饪。同时，在一个大煎锅中，用中高火融化黄油。加入虾、大蒜和红辣椒片。偶尔翻炒，直到虾变粉并完全煮熟，约2-3分钟。拌入白葡萄酒和柠檬汁，煮沸后煮1分钟。拌入欧芹，用盐和胡椒调味。沥干扁面条，加入煎锅中，搅拌均匀。立即享用。

recipes.strInstructions: Line a 9-inch-square baking pan with parchment paper. In a medium saucepan, combine the sugar, cocoa powder, and milk. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, stirring constantly. Reduce the heat to low and cook for 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from the heat and stir in the butter and vanilla. Pour the mixture into the prepared pan and refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Cut into squares and serve.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 在一个9英寸方形烤盘上铺上烘焙纸。在一个中等大小的炖锅中，混合糖、可可粉和牛奶。用中高火煮沸，不断搅拌。调至小火，煮5分钟，持续搅拌。离火，拌入黄油和香草精。将混合物倒入准备好的烤盘中，冷藏至少2小时。切成方块即可享用。

recipes.strInstructions:
STEP 1
Lay the pork chops on a board and using a sharp knife, cut a few slashes into the fat of each chop. Cover with a sheet of baking parchment and bash with a rolling pin until the pork is about 1cm thick. Sprinkle with a little salt and pepper, then dip each chop into the flour, followed by the egg and finally the panko breadcrumbs, making sure you have an even coating all over. Chill in the fridge for 20 mins.
STEP 2
To make the sauce, mix all the ingredients together and set aside.
STEP 3
Fill a large, deep pan one-third full with the oil and heat to 170C or until a cube of bread dropped in turns brown in 30 seconds. Carefully lower the pork into the hot oil and fry for 2-3 mins on each side until golden and cooked through. You may have to do this in batches. Remove from the pan and drain on kitchen paper.
STEP 4
To serve, slice the tonkatsu and serve with the sauce, rice and a scattering of spring onions.
recipes.strInstructions_zh:
第一步
将猪排放在案板上，用锋利的刀在每块猪排的脂肪上划几刀。盖上一张烘焙纸，用擀面杖敲打，直到猪排约1厘米厚。撒上少许盐和胡椒，然后将每块猪排依次蘸上面粉、鸡蛋液，最后是日式面包糠，确保均匀覆盖。放入冰箱冷藏20分钟。
第二步
制作酱汁：将所有酱汁材料混合均匀备用。
第三步
在一个大的深锅中倒入三分之一的油，加热至170°C，或者直到一块面包丁在30秒内变成棕色。小心地将猪排放入热油中，每面炸2-3分钟，直到金黄并完全熟透。可能需要分批炸制。从锅中取出，放在厨房纸上沥油。
第四步
上桌时，将炸猪排切片，搭配酱汁、米饭和一些葱花即可。

recipes.strInstructions: Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan and add the onions. Cook for 5 mins until soft, then add the garlic, aubergine, courgettes and peppers. Cook for 5 mins more, then stir in the tomatoes, tomato purée and herbs. Bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 20 mins, or until the vegetables are tender. Season with salt and pepper and serve with crusty bread.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 在一个大炖锅中加热橄榄油，加入洋葱。煮5分钟直到变软，然后加入大蒜、茄子、西葫芦和甜椒。再煮5分钟，然后拌入番茄、番茄膏和普罗旺斯香草。煮沸后，调低火力，慢炖20分钟，或者直到蔬菜变嫩。用盐和胡椒调味，与硬皮面包一同食用。

recipes.strInstructions: Put the fries in the fryer, and bake them golden brown. When the fries are almost done, add the shawarma to a frying pan and bake for a few minutes until heated. Grate the cheese. Take an aluminum tray and cover the bottom with the fries. Cover the fries with the shawarma. Cover the shawarma with the grated cheese. Put the tray in the oven until the cheese is melted. While the kapsalon is in the oven, prepare the salad. Mix the iceberg lettuce and cucumber and top it with the garlic sauce and sambal. Serve the kapsalon with the salad on top.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 将薯条放入炸锅，炸至金黄色。当薯条快好时，将沙威玛烤肉放入煎锅中，加热几分钟。磨碎奶酪。取一个铝制托盘，底部铺上薯条。在薯条上铺上沙威玛烤肉。在烤肉上撒满磨碎的奶酪。将托盘放入烤箱，直到奶酪融化。当烤肉薯条在烤箱中时，准备沙拉。将生菜和黄瓜混合，淋上蒜蓉酱和参巴酱。将沙拉铺在烤肉薯条上即可食用。

recipes.strInstructions: For the Big Mac sauce, combine all the ingredients in a bowl, season with salt and pepper and set aside. To make the patties, season the mince with salt and pepper and form into 4 balls using your hands. Shape into patties that are slightly bigger than your burger buns. Heat a large frying pan or griddle and cook the patties for 3-4 mins on each side. While the second side is cooking, top two of the patties with a slice of cheese. To assemble the burger, toast the buns. On the bottom bun, add a layer of shredded lettuce, a slice of onion and a slice of pickle. Top with a cheese-topped patty, then a layer of the Big Mac sauce. Add the middle bun, then more lettuce, onion, pickle and the second patty. Finally, top with more Big Mac sauce and the top bun. Serve with fries.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 制作巨无霸酱：将所有酱料材料在一个碗中混合，用盐和胡椒调味后备用。制作肉饼：用盐和胡椒为牛肉末调味，用手将其分成4个球。塑形成比汉堡面包稍大的肉饼。预热一个大煎锅或烤盘，每面煎3-4分钟。在煎第二面时，在其中两个肉饼上放上一片奶酪。组装汉堡：烤一下面包。在底层面包上，铺上一层生菜丝、一片洋葱和一片酸黄瓜。放上带奶酪的肉饼，然后是一层巨无霸酱。放上中间层面包，然后是更多的生菜、洋葱、酸黄瓜和第二个肉饼。最后，再淋上更多的巨无霸酱和顶层面包。与薯条一起食用。

recipes.strInstructions: In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, rice vinegar, and 2 tablespoons of water. In a separate bowl, whisk together the cornstarch and 1/4 cup of water. In a large bowl, toss the chicken with the soy sauce mixture. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook, stirring occasionally, until browned and cooked through. Add the garlic, ginger, and red pepper flakes and cook for 1 minute. Stir in the soy sauce mixture and bring to a boil. Stir in the cornstarch mixture and cook until the sauce has thickened. Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds. Serve immediately.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 在一个小碗里，混合酱油、米醋和2汤匙水。在另一个碗里，混合玉米淀粉和1/4杯水。在一个大碗里，将鸡肉与酱油混合物搅拌均匀。在一个大煎锅中用中高火加热油。加入鸡肉，偶尔翻炒，直到变色并完全煮熟。加入大蒜、姜和红辣椒片，煮1分钟。拌入酱油混合物，煮沸。拌入玉米淀粉混合物，煮至酱汁变稠。用葱花和芝麻点缀。立即享用。

recipes.strInstructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the pasta and cook according to package directions. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, Parmesan, and a pinch of salt and pepper. In a large skillet, cook the pancetta over medium-high heat until crisp. Drain the pasta, reserving 1 cup of the pasta water. Add the pasta to the skillet with the pancetta. Toss to combine. Add the egg mixture and toss to combine. Add the reserved pasta water, a little at a time, until the sauce is creamy. Serve immediately.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 将一大锅盐水煮沸。加入意面，根据包装说明烹饪。在一个大碗里，将鸡蛋、帕玛森奶酪和一小撮盐和胡椒搅拌均匀。在一个大煎锅中，用中高火将意式烟肉煎至酥脆。沥干意面，保留1杯煮意面的水。将意面加入有烟肉的煎锅中，搅拌均匀。加入鸡蛋混合物，搅拌均匀。一点一点地加入保留的煮面水，直到酱汁变得奶油状。立即享用。

recipes.strInstructions: Heat the olive oil in a large paella pan or skillet. Add the chicken and cook until browned on all sides. Add the onion, garlic, and red pepper and cook until soft. Add the rice and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add the saffron, paprika, and thyme and cook for 1 minute. Add the wine and cook until it has evaporated. Add the stock and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked through. Add the shrimp, mussels, and peas and cook for 5 minutes, or until the shrimp are pink and the mussels have opened. Garnish with lemon wedges and parsley. Serve immediately.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 在一个大的西班牙海鲜饭锅或煎锅中加热橄榄油。加入鸡肉，煎至四面金黄。加入洋葱、大蒜和红椒，煮至变软。加入米饭，不停搅拌煮1分钟。加入藏红花、辣椒粉和百里香，煮1分钟。加入白葡萄酒，煮至蒸发。加入鸡汤，煮沸。调低火力，慢炖20分钟，或直到米饭完全煮熟。加入虾、青口贝和豌豆，煮5分钟，或直到虾变粉、青口贝张开。用柠檬角和欧芹点缀。立即享用。

recipes.strInstructions: In a large bowl, mash the bananas. Whisk in the eggs, then stir in the flour, baking powder, and a pinch of salt. Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat. Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake. Brown on both sides and serve hot. Top with your favorite toppings.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 在一个大碗里，捣烂香蕉。打入鸡蛋搅拌均匀，然后拌入面粉、泡打粉和一小撮盐。用中高火预热一个轻微抹油的烤盘或煎锅。将面糊倒入烤盘上，每个松饼大约用1/4杯。两面煎至棕色即可趁热享用。搭配你喜欢的配料。

recipes.strInstructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the fettuccine and cook according to package directions. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Stir in the heavy cream and bring to a simmer. Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly. Stir in the Parmesan cheese and season with salt and pepper to taste. Drain the fettuccine and add it to the skillet. Toss to combine. Serve immediately.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 将一大锅盐水煮沸。加入菲图其内宽面，根据包装说明烹饪。在一个大煎锅中，用中火融化黄油。加入大蒜，炒香约1分钟。拌入鲜奶油，煮沸。煮2-3分钟，或直到酱汁稍微变稠。拌入帕玛森奶酪，用盐和胡椒调味。沥干宽面，加入煎锅中，搅拌均匀。立即享用。

recipes.strInstructions: In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, rice vinegar, and 2 tablespoons of water. In a separate bowl, whisk together the cornstarch and 1/4 cup of water. In a large bowl, toss the chicken with the soy sauce mixture. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook, stirring occasionally, until browned and cooked through. Add the garlic, ginger, and red pepper flakes and cook for 1 minute. Add the peanuts and cook for 1 minute. Stir in the soy sauce mixture and bring to a boil. Stir in the cornstarch mixture and cook until the sauce has thickened. Garnish with green onions and serve immediately.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 在一个小碗里，混合酱油、米醋和2汤匙水。在另一个碗里，混合玉米淀粉和1/4杯水。在一个大碗里，将鸡肉与酱油混合物搅拌均匀。在一个大煎锅中用中高火加热油。加入鸡肉，偶尔翻炒，直到变色并完全煮熟。加入大蒜、姜和红辣椒片，煮1分钟。加入花生，煮1分钟。拌入酱油混合物，煮沸。拌入玉米淀粉混合物，煮至酱汁变稠。用葱花点缀，立即享用。

recipes.strInstructions: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the beef and cook until browned on all sides. Remove from the skillet and set aside. Add the onions and mushrooms to the skillet and cook until soft. Stir in the flour and cook for 1 minute. Gradually whisk in the beef broth and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 10 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened. Stir in the sour cream, mustard, and beef. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve over egg noodles.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 在一个大煎锅中用中高火加热油。加入牛肉，煎至四面金黄。从煎锅中取出备用。将洋葱和蘑菇加入煎锅中，煮至变软。拌入面粉，煮1分钟。逐渐搅入牛肉汤，煮沸。调低火力，慢炖10分钟，或直到酱汁变稠。拌入酸奶油、芥末酱和牛肉。用盐和胡椒调味。搭配鸡蛋面条食用。

recipes.strInstructions: Preheat the oven to 200C/180C fan/gas 6. Roll out the pastry on a lightly floured surface and use it to line a 23cm loose-bottomed tart tin. Trim the edges and chill for 20 mins. Line the pastry case with baking parchment and fill with baking beans. Bake for 15 mins, then remove the beans and parchment and bake for 5 mins more. To make the frangipane, beat the butter and sugar together until pale and fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the ground almonds and vanilla extract. Spread the frangipane evenly over the pastry case. Arrange the apple slices on top and sprinkle with the demerara sugar. Bake for 30-35 mins, or until the frangipane is golden and firm. Serve warm with cream or ice cream.
recipes.strInstructions_zh: 预热烤箱至200°C。在撒有少许面粉的表面上擀开酥皮，用它来铺满一个23厘米的活底挞盘。修剪边缘，冷藏20分钟。在挞皮上铺上烘焙纸，填满烘焙豆。烘烤15分钟，然后取出豆子和烘焙纸，再烤5分钟。制作杏仁奶油馅：将黄油和糖一起打发至颜色变浅、质地蓬松。逐个打入鸡蛋，然后拌入杏仁粉和香草精。将杏仁奶油馅均匀地铺在挞皮上。在上面排列苹果片，撒上红糖。烘烤30-35分钟，或直到杏仁奶油馅呈金黄色并凝固。趁热与奶油或冰淇淋一同食用。
